featured.text: During the Age of Exploration, commerce in Zanzibar quickly boomed, largely due to the rise of the spice trade.
Today, they provide low-budget, overnight lodging in commerce centers in large cities worldwide.

definition.zh_def: 商業；貿易，特別是大規模的買賣活動。
definition.en_def: The activity of buying and selling, especially on a large scale.
definition.example: The rise of e-commerce has changed the way people shop.
